definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to

sentences.english: All these writers run to sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些作家都有傷感的傾向。

sentences.english: And Trump's governing concept shows a strong inclination toward neo-isolationism.
sentences.chinese: 從其執政理念看，新孤立主義傾向明顯。

sentences.english: Like Stephen, I tend to be somewhat contrary by nature.
sentences.chinese: 像斯蒂芬一樣，我也是生來傾向逆向思考。

sentences.english: We all tend to like those similar to us.
sentences.chinese: 我們都傾向於喜歡一些像我們的人。

sentences.english: Errors indeed in this virtue of goodness, or charity, may be committed.
sentences.chinese: 但人性中這種仁善的傾向，有時也會犯錯誤。

sentences.english: Types existed in personage's image-building in the novels of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清講史小說在人物形象塑造上存在着類型化傾向。

sentences.english: The figure in Japanese hybrid tended to be higher.
sentences.chinese: 以日系雜交原種有偏高的傾向。

sentences.english: Ifthe threat is from the side, the fly leans the other way before takeoff.
sentences.chinese: 借使威脅來自這邊，蒼蠅起飛前會傾向另一側。

sentences.english: Different languages tend to arrange the order of adverbial clauses in different ways.
sentences.chinese: 不同的語言傾向於使用不同語序來組織狀語從句。

sentences.english: And these findings are more favourable to Bush than more recent surveys.
sentences.chinese: 與很多近來調查相比，這些調查結果比較傾向於布什。

sentences.english: They warn us of dangerous trends. They point out potent evils.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲我們警告對危險傾向，指出潛在的邪惡。

sentences.english: Both Rendell and Casey have put their prestige on the line in this election.
sentences.chinese: 倫德爾和凱西的威望和他們的選舉傾向一致。

sentences.english: A struggle has been started against the tendency towards new warlordism in the Eighth Route Army .
sentences.chinese: 在八路軍中，開始向新軍閥主義傾向作鬥爭。

sentences.english: In my experience, I would agree with that statement.
sentences.chinese: 以我的經驗，我更傾向與贊同第二種說法。

sentences.english: First, I must disclose that I'm biased. I love my caffeine.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我必須說明，我是有傾向性的，我喜歡咖啡。

sentences.english: Piscean tends to be generally good-natured and very kind and loving.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座更傾向於和藹，友好而鍾情。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
